welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Torcy, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and lively atmosphere. We invite you to explore its unique culture and indulge in its delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals and serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and business flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may have limited bandwidth and speed.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
